What program do I run this on?

Lucasimo10,
there is only one .exe file. Launch it.

How do you change the language in the game? everything runs perfect but it is a bit difficult to play because I pretty much just guess how to do everything. I basically just need step by step directions on how to find the language settings.

@bastard-samurai
After installing the game go to its folder and open "rev" or "rev.ini" in Notepad or any editor you like.
Then find "Language = Russian" and replace with "Language = English".
That's all.
